channel.title: Player Ranks
channel.description: [center][size=24pt]Base: Project Insanity.[/size][/center] Hello Moparscape users, I am trying to figure out how to make it where if a player has player rights of 0. That means they are banned from server. With doing this i'd also need to understand how to make it where when a player logs in they instantly have a player rights of 1. (Witch makes then a normal player.) Any assistance with this would be Greatly appreciated, thank you.

item.title: Player Ranks
item.dc:creator: @Kastro1 Kastro_
item.description:
@Kastro1 wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:13, topic:459309”]In your addstarter method or w.e. where you give starter add for making them player rights one at start

then for banning add that’s if you want player right 0 to be ban rank even though I see no point.

RS2LoginProtocolDecoder:

if (c.playerRights == 0) { returnCode = 4; }

But why would you give them rights at all?[/quote]

I think he plans to make another method to ban people, so now with the code he’s got provided he could do ::setrights 0 (user) or something like that to ban a user in-game; I don’t really see the point in this though.

Read full topic

item.title: Player Ranks
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

In your addstarter method or w.e. where you give starter add for making them player rights one at start

then for banning add that’s if you want player right 0 to be ban rank even though I see no point.

RS2LoginProtocolDecoder:

if (c.playerRights == 0) { returnCode = 4; }

But why would you give them rights at all?

Read full topic

item.title: Player Ranks
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Virgin, post:11, topic:459309”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=562213.msg4099828#msg4099828 date=1347316695]

[quote author=Virgin link=topic=562213.msg4099826#msg4099826 date=1347316664]

Able yes, but it would take a lot of work,
you could better just declare a new variable for the things you want to add
[/quote]And could you help me with this work?

  • change all loaders e.g. chat, run
  • change all permissions
  • get started
    [/quote]That’s helping me none. Could you tell me the all of the Files I will be editing?

You mean spoonfedding? NO

De Fuq? I just asked what are the files I will be editing… So I don’t mess up and forget to edit it somewhere. I know Client.java, and commands.java. What else?[/quote]
player class definitely also
Depends wherefor the source creator used rights for,
its full of spots where its used its impossible to say what you will have to edit all

Read full topic

item.title: Player Ranks
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:4, topic:459309”][quote author=Virgin link=topic=562213.msg4099762#msg4099762 date=1347312443]

If the player is banned, I guess he shouldn’t access the server at all.
So why would you want to give them rights?
[/quote]Nooo lol, you miss understood me.
Lets say a new player joined my server, I want the to start with player rights of 1. (normal player)
Now lets say that player scammed another player, I would like to ban that player… And when he is banned he would have a player right of 0.
How would I be able to do this,
my server’s player rights 1 is taken by a moderator, witch in the future I would like to make mod-owner to be 5-7 pR.

Why would you want the playerrights to be 0 of a banned player? He can’t even login, it makes no point.
You would have to change everything where mod-admin-owner rights are called[/quote]Okay, you know what. Just how would I be able to change my ranks to this:

pR = 0; = Player. pR = 1; = Donor pR = 2; = Super Donor pR = 3; = Veteran pR = 4; = Moderator pR = 5; = Administrator pR = 6; = Hidden Admin pR = 7; = Owner.
from:

pR = 0; = Player. pR = 1; = Mod pR = 2; = Admin pR = 3; = Owner pR = 4; = Donor pR = 5; = ? pR = 6; = ? pR = 7; = Hidden Owner.

Read full topic

item.title: Player Ranks
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Virgin, post:3, topic:459309”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=562213.msg4099756#msg4099756 date=1347312114]
If the player is banned, I guess he shouldn’t access the server at all.
So why would you want to give them rights?
[/quote]Nooo lol, you miss understood me.
Lets say a new player joined my server, I want the to start with player rights of 1. (normal player)
Now lets say that player scammed another player, I would like to ban that player… And when he is banned he would have a player right of 0.
How would I be able to do this,
my server’s player rights 1 is taken by a moderator, witch in the future I would like to make mod-owner to be 5-7 pR.[/quote]

Why would you want the playerrights to be 0 of a banned player? He can’t even login, it makes no point.
You would have to change everything where mod-admin-owner rights are called

Read full topic
